00097 CReadDisplay* CDisplay::createReadInstance( CReadWindow* readWindow ) {
00098     Q_ASSERT(readWindow);
00099     if (readWindow)
00100         return new CHTMLReadDisplay(readWindow);
00101   else
00102     return 0;
00103 }

00110 CDisplay::CDisplay(CDisplayWindow* parent) : m_parentWindow(parent) {
00111   qWarning("constructor of CDisplay");
00112   m_connections = new CDisplayConnections( this );

00118 const bool CDisplay::copy( const CDisplay::TextType format, const CDisplay::TextPart part  ) {
00119   qWarning("CDisplay::copy( const CDisplay::TextType format, const CDisplay::TextPart part  )");
00120   const QString content = text(format, part);
00121 
00122   QClipboard* cb = KApplication::clipboard();
00123   cb->setText(content);
00124 }
00125 
00126 const bool CDisplay::save( const CDisplay::TextType format, const CDisplay::TextPart part ) {
00127   qWarning("CDisplay::save( const CDisplay::TextType format, const CDisplay::TextPart part  )");
00128   const QString content = text(format, part);
00129   QString filter = QString::null;
00130 
00131   switch (format) {
00132     case HTMLText:
00133       filter = QString::fromLatin1("*.html *.htm | ") + i18n("HTML files") + QString::fromLatin1("\n *.* | All files (*.*)");
00134       break;
00135     case PlainText:
00136       filter = QString::fromLatin1("*.txt | ") + i18n("Text files") + QString::fromLatin1("\n *.* | All files (*.*)");
00137       break;
00138   };
00139 
00140   const QString filename = KFileDialog::getSaveFileName(QString::null, filter, 0, i18n("Save document ..."));
00141   if (!filename.isEmpty()) {
00142     CToolClass::savePlainFile(filename, content);
00143   }
00144 
00145 }
00146 
00148 void CDisplay::emitReferenceClicked( const QString& reference ){
00149   QString module;
00150   QString key;
00151   CReferenceManager::Type type;
00152   const bool ok = CReferenceManager::decodeHyperlink(reference, module, key, type);
00153   if (module.isEmpty()) {
00154     module = CReferenceManager::preferredModule( type );
00155   }
00156   m_connections->emitReferenceClicked(module, key);
00157 }
00158 
00160 void CDisplay::emitReferenceDropped( const QString& reference ){
00161   QString module;
00162   QString key;
00163   CReferenceManager::Type type;
00164   const bool ok = CReferenceManager::decodeHyperlink(reference, module, key, type);
00165 //  if (module.isEmpty()) {
00166 //    module = CReferenceManager::preferredModule( type );
00167 //  }
00168 
00169   m_connections->emitReferenceDropped(key);
00170 }
